text: hananim-ui malsseum-i geudeul-ege nangsongdoeeoss-eul ttae geudeul-eun malhadoda igeos-eun neohui josangdeul-i sungbaehayeo on geos-eulobuteo neohuileul banghaehagojahaneun han sanaee bulgwahadoda tto geudeul-eun malhadoda igeos-eun danji goan doen wijo-e bulgwahanola tto bulsinja deul-eun jinlie gwanhayeo geugeos-i geudeul ege dolaehani sillo igeos-eun bunmyeong han masul-e bulgwahadoda lago malha yeossnola
